usage: Strategic publisher inventory allocation and revenue optimization through collaborative intelligence

dataMapping.title: Strategic Publisher Inventory Allocation
dataMapping.subtitle: Revenue-optimized inventory distribution through collaborative analysis

allocations.primaryLabel: Inventory category (e.g., 'Premium Video Inventory', 'Native Content Integration', 'Display Premium')
allocations.secondaryLabel: Revenue strategy (e.g., 'Direct Premium Sales', 'Programmatic Premium', 'Hybrid Approach')
allocations.allocationPercentage: Inventory percentage allocated to this category
allocations.safety: Advertiser satisfaction and brand safety score
